text: Ðis is þara VII hidæ boc æt harewellæ þe Eadgar cing gebocodæ æÆlfricæ his þegne on ece yrfæ.
Ðis syndan þara VII hida landgemæro.
Ærest of þam ællanstubbe on þone oðerenne ellestub.
And swa on þa ealdan firh.
Þanon to smalan wege & swa ymbutan flegges garan.
Þanon andlang þæs smalan weges utt on humbracumb swa on ycenilde weg a forh be wege eft on þone ellenstub.
And swa on hreo mæde þa non on þa ealdan cot stowa.
Þa non on þæt lange furlang swa on cylmæscumb on snelles garon.
Ærest andlang þæs ealdan broces of suðtuniga lace and swa on stocwylle broc þa non on þone ealdan broc.
